summary: Keep cron out of the pre-upgrade deploy path

changes.description: Release-cohort gating now excludes the Magento cron service, so deploys no longer wait for new cron tasks to converge before `setup:upgrade` and `app:config:import` run.

If `setup:upgrade` loses the MariaDB container during deploy retries, the worker now forces a database service restart before retrying instead of leaving the deploy stranded on `Timed out waiting for database container`.
